content.question: How does NIDA-Pakistan ensure equal employment opportunity for candidates?

answers.option: By hiring based on merit and competencies while prohibiting discrimination on any basis.
By selecting candidates based on personal connections.
By prioritizing male candidates for all positions.
By using subjective interview scoring without validation.
